name: redirect-url
description: Catch all and redirect to a specified url.

scripts.start-dev: TEMPORARY_REDIRECT='True' LOG_LEVEL=debug TO_HOST='https://bbc.com/' REPLACE_PATH='news' REPLACE_PATH_WITH='moved-news' nodemon app.js
scripts.start-dev-truncate: TEMPORARY_REDIRECT='True' LOG_LEVEL=debug TO_HOST='https://bbc.com/' REMOVE_PATH_AFTER='/news/' nodemon app.js
scripts.test-integration-in-docker: ID=$(docker build -q .) && LOCAL_IMAGE_ID=$ID docker-compose -f docker-compose-integration-tests.yml build && LOCAL_IMAGE_ID=$ID docker-compose -f docker-compose-integration-tests.yml up --build --no-log-prefix --quiet-pull --abort-on-container-exit --always-recreate-deps --force-recreate
scripts.test-unit-in-docker: ID=$(docker build -q .) && LOCAL_IMAGE_ID=$ID WORKSPACE=$(pwd) docker-compose -f docker-compose-unit-tests.yml up --build --no-log-prefix --quiet-pull --abort-on-container-exit --always-recreate-deps --force-recreate
scripts.package-update: git pull && npm run clean & ncu -u && npm install && npm audit fix && npm run test-unit-in-docker && npm run test-integration-in-docker
